# ctrlplane_deployment_variable (Resource)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `deployment_id` (String) The deployment ID this variable belongs to
- `key` (String) The variable key

### Optional

- `default_value` (Dynamic) The default value for the variable
- `description` (String) The variable description

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of the deployment variable
